trans-unit.source: Provides a common base implementation for channel listeners on the service.
trans-unit.target: 服务上的通道侦听器提供通用的基实现。

trans-unit.source: The channel listeners on the service wait for and then accept the channels created by factories on the client.
trans-unit.target: 在服务上的通道侦听器等待，然后接受客户端上的工厂创建的通道。

trans-unit.source: Once the channel connection is established between client and service, messages can be exchanged and distributed applications can communicate.
trans-unit.target: 一旦客户端和服务之间建立了通道连接，消息可以进行交换，分布式应用程序进行通信。

trans-unit.source: The processing functionality provided by the listener is layered into a stacked set of channel listeners to provide modularity when selecting the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] features to deploy.
trans-unit.target: 侦听器提供的处理功能分层为选择时提供模块化的通道侦听器堆栈集[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]功能进行部署。

trans-unit.source: Each channel listener in the service stack corresponds to a channel factory in the client stack.
trans-unit.target: 服务堆栈中的每个通道侦听器对应于客户端堆栈中的通道工厂。

trans-unit.source: The channel created by the factory is really a stack of channels that are accepted and processed by the stack of listeners on the service.
trans-unit.target: 由工厂创建的通道实际上是接受并处理由服务上的侦听器堆栈的通道堆栈。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes timeout properties with the service model timeout values when exchanging messages.
trans-unit.target: 交换消息时，默认构造函数初始化与服务模型超时值对超时属性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1 minute for open, send, and close operations and 10 minutes for the receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1 分钟打开、 发送和关闭操作和接收操作的 10 分钟。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29> if you want to specify other values for these operation timeouts.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>如果想要为这些操作超时指定其他值。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase"></xref> class with specified default communication timeouts.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase"></xref>使用指定的默认通信超时值的类。

trans-unit.source: Use ChannelListenerBase instead of the default constructor if you want to specify custom values for the open, send, receive, and close operation timeouts instead of using the service model default values.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要指定自定义值的 open、 send、 接收和关闭操作超时，而不是使用服务模型默认值，请使用 ChannelListenerBase 而不是默认构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts> that specify the default timeouts for open, send, receive, and close operations when exchanging messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts>指定的默认超时为打开、 发送、 接收和交换消息时关闭操作。</xref:System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, begins an asynchronous operation to wait for a channel to arrive.
trans-unit.target: 派生类中实现时，开始一个异步操作以等待通道到达。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the wait for a channel operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan>，它指定在超时前完成等待通道操作的时限。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous completion of the wait for a channel operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AsyncCallback>接收等待通道操作异步完成通知的委托。</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous wait for a channel operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的对象，由应用程序，它包含与异步等待通道操作相关联的状态信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous wait for a channel operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>引用异步等待通道操作。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The channel listener has not been opened and so cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: 通道侦听器尚未打开，因此无法使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default interval of time provided for a close operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 获取为完成关闭操作提供的时间的默认间隔。

trans-unit.source: This value is set when creating a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase> object.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新时设置此值<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase>对象。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor> constructor sets the DefaultCloseTimeout property to a value of 1 minute.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor>构造函数将 DefaultCloseTimeout 属性设置为值 1 分钟。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29> if you want to specify another value for this timeout.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>如果你想要为此超时指定其他值。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the close operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.TimeSpan>，它指定在超时前完成关闭操作的时限。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets the default interval of time provided for an open operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 获取为完成打开操作提供的时间的默认间隔。

trans-unit.source: This value is set when creating a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase> object.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新时设置此值<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase>对象。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor> constructor sets the DefaultOpenTimeout property to a value of 1 minute.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor>构造函数将 DefaultOpenTimeout 属性设置为值 1 分钟。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29> if you want to specify another value for this timeout.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>如果你想要为此超时指定其他值。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the open operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.TimeSpan>，指定在超时前完成打开操作必须多长时间。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets the default interval of time provided for a receive operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 获取为完成接收操作提供的时间的默认间隔。

trans-unit.source: This value is set when creating a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase> object.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新时设置此值<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase>对象。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor> constructor sets the DefaultReceiveTimeout property to a value of 10 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor>构造函数将 DefaultReceiveTimeout 属性设置为 10 分钟的值。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29> if you want to specify another value for this timeout.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>如果你想要为此超时指定其他值。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the receive operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.TimeSpan>，指定在超时前完成接收操作必须多长时间。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets the default interval of time provided for a send operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 获取为完成发送操作提供的时间的默认间隔。

trans-unit.source: This value is set when creating a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase> object.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新时设置此值<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase>对象。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor> constructor sets the DefaultSendTimeout property to a value of 1 minute.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor>构造函数将 DefaultSendTimeout 属性设置为值 1 分钟。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29> if you want to specify another value for this timeout.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>如果你想要为此超时指定其他值。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the send operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.TimeSpan>，指定在超时前完成发送操作必须多长时间。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, completes an asynchronous operation to wait for channels to arrive.
trans-unit.target: 派生类中实现时，完成一个异步操作以等待通道到达。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by a call to the EndWaitForChannel method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>EndWaitForChannel 方法调用返回。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a message arrived; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果消息已到达;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, provides a point of extensibility when starting to wait for a channel to arrive.
trans-unit.target: 派生类中实现时，请在开始等待通道到达时提供一个扩展的点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the on begin wait operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan>，指定在开始等待操作必须在超时前完成多长时间。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation on begin wait completion.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AsyncCallback>接收通知的异步操作的委托开始等待完成。</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous on begin wait operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定应用程序，它包含与异步上相关联的状态信息的对象开始等待操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous on begin wait operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>引用异步开始等待操作。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, provides a point of extensibility when ending the waiting for a channel to arrive.
trans-unit.target: 派生类中实现时，请在结束等待通道到达时提供一个扩展的点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by a call to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.OnBeginWaitForChannel%28System.TimeSpan%2CSystem.AsyncCallback%2CSystem.Object%29> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>返回通过调用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase.OnBeginWaitForChannel%28System.TimeSpan%2CSystem.AsyncCallback%2CSystem.Object%29>方法。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: if the method completed before the interval of time specified by the timeout expired; otherwise .
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的时间间隔内完成的方法 timeout 过期; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, provides a point of extensibility when waiting for a channel to arrive.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，请等待通道到达时提供一个扩展的点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the on wait for a channel operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan>，指定在等待通道操作必须在超时前完成多长时间。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: if the method completed before the interval of time specified by the timeout expired; otherwise .
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的时间间隔内完成的方法 timeout 过期; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in derived class, gets the URI on which the channel listener listens for an incoming channel.
trans-unit.target: 派生类中实现时，获取在其的通道侦听器为传入通道侦听的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> on which the channel listener listens for incoming channels.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Uri>上传入通道的通道侦听器侦听该。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, waits for a channel to arrive.
trans-unit.target: 派生类中实现时，等待通道到达。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the wait for a channel operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan>，它指定在超时前完成等待通道操作的时限。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: if a channel arrived before the interval of time specified by the timeout expired; otherwise .
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的时间间隔内到达通道 timeout 过期; 否则为 。
